message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable asset. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1150000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I still need to ensure a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1080000. I'm getting closer to meeting you halfway, but I need to make sure it's worth my while.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1070000.

I'm getting closer to meeting you in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I'm counteroffering at $1060000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering our previous offers, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1055000.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. I'm counteroffering at $1055500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll accept it.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1050000.
